videos.description: Ryan Pippins uses glass on a deep 3-pointer at the buzzer to send the game to overtime vs. Georgetown.
videos.headline: Little Rock forces OT on banked 3-pointer at buzzer

videos.description: Mac McClung nails a 3-pointer and is fouled during overtime to increase Georgetown's lead over Little Rock.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (McClung hits the dagger in OT for Georgetown) 2018/12/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: McClung hits the dagger in OT for Georgetown
